content.question: Kieran owns and operates his own bike shop. In the past week, a competitor offered to buy Kieran’s bike shop for $100,000 and hire Kieran for $50,000 per year.  Assume the annual interest rate is 6 percent, and Kieran’s accounting profit from his bike shop is $60,000. Kieran’s economic profit is

unit.text: 3: Production, Cost, and the Perfect Competition Model

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Identify an economic concept, principle, or model using quantitative data or calculations.
